response.overview: A poem in image, sound and text like a glittering imagination: crystal clear yet fragmented. The question is: what can you see and what can't you? The sun is too bright to look into, while its reflection on the water is soft. A light source and its reflection are the same, but also different. Eyes, a face, sources of light, hands and what is intangible are combined with poetic words in this short experimental film. The first sight – over soft water – reflects hard light.
response.title: Her Eye
